heading.content: Launching the Eiffel for .NET Compliance Checker

paragraph.paragraph: The Eiffel for .NET Compliance Checker supports the notion of a project, in that projects can be created, presisted, opened and manipulated. Projects are more for use by component developers wishing to create projects for assemblies they will check again and again. In the compliance checker a project simply consists of an assembly to check and the reference paths used to resolve any dependencies the specified assembly has.
All project management functions are controlled via the tool's toolbar. For more information please see, ../30_user_interface/10_using_the_toolbar.xmlUsing the Toolbar.
